original_text: We have a lot more to say to you about these things. But you are slow to understand things. As a result, it is difficult to explain any more to you now.
korean_text: 멜기세덱에 관하여는 우리가 할 말이 많으나 너희가 듣는 것이 둔하므로 설명하기 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: We have a lot more to say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신에게 더 많은 말을 할 것이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But you are slow to understand things
